com.BombingGames.WurfelEngine.shooting

Class Bullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.BombingGames.WurfelEngine.Core.Gameobjects.AbstractGameObject
      • com.BombingGames.WurfelEngine.Core.Gameobjects.AbstractEntity
        • com.BombingGames.WurfelEngine.shooting.Bullet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasID, java.io.Serializable

    public class Bullet
extends AbstractEntity
    A bullet is a moving object which can destroy and damage entities or the world.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Bullet

        public Bullet()
        You can set a different sprite via #setGraphicsId(int) . It uses the engine default sprite.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Description copied from class: AbstractEntity
        Deletes the object from the map and every other container. The opposite to spawn() but removes it completely.;
        Overrides:
        dispose in class AbstractEntity
